i am not married.
i have high speed internet.

participant_2.background:
My weight is perfect for my body type and lifestyle.
I love to relax by reading books, watching Jimmy Fallon, and cheering on the Raptors.
I go for long walks with my dog and explore new places.
I do my best to be a good parent, but it's not always easy.
my father is a school teacher , he teaches middle school.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a navy brat and have attended 16 schools in 12 years.
My father is a school teacher. Does that mean you're a military brat?
Yes, I was. I'm the youngest of three brothers.
That must have been a lot of moving around.
It was, but I'm glad I got to experience different places.
I can see how that would be a good thing. I'm glad you're able to look back on it positively.
Yeah, I'm not so sure my older brothers feel the same way!
They're probably just jealous that you got to see all those new places.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to read, go for walks, and explore new places.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I like to do those things too.
That's great! Maybe we can do something together sometime.
That would be fun! I'm free this weekend.
Me too! I'll message you and we can figure out what to do.
Great! I'm looking forward to it.
